mainText:
My prayers goes out firstly to the Jobs family, friends and people at large who his life's work affected. I just had to thank God for his life. Through his work he literally changed my life from my first encounters with a Mac way
 back in the mid-eighties at college, through to becoming a graphic designer
 right up until today. Thank you once again Mr Steve Jobs, who made expressing my creativity a complete joy. "once your a graphic designer, always a graphic designer" especially with a Mac to work on. -
 Rest in peace.
author: David
